metadata.synopsis:
When no valid companion for abduction is available, Orin insteadbducts Yenna -  a beggar child who previously greeted players when they entered Wyrm’s Crossing, and who subsequently keeps appearing in their camp. Appearing as Yenna, Orin will try to get the player to drink a poisoned soup, before revealing herself.



 She tells the player that the real Yenna is in the Bhaal Temple, and gives them an ultimatum about killing Gortash and retrieving the Netherstone. If they do this, then she will not kill Yenna, and will duel the player instead.
metadata.how_to_trigger: 1) Got the any Undercity location with Debugbook 2) -> Go to region 3) -> Act 3 4) -> Undercity 5) -> Bhaal Temple (or any other Undercity location).6) Add the companion to the camp with the Camp Debug Book.7) Go to camp by the Waypoint system, And start longRest by clicking on the bed/campfire.8) OR you can click the LongRest button from outside the camp which will end the day and teleport all to camp.9) This Campfire Moment dialog will trigger once the night starts automatically.

35.speaker: GROUP_Act3_WYR_OrinsImpersonation_Yenna
35.text: A bit of salt on the top and -
35.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player enters camp. They find Yenna in a secluded area of camp, her back to them. She is facing a small cooking fire, unrecogniseable pieces of meat roasting over it on a skewer. We can't see what she's doing.

48.speaker: GROUP_Act3_WYR_OrinsImpersonation_Yenna
48.text: Argh! You're here. I'm not ready. I mean, I think I'm ready.
48.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player approaches while Yenna has her back to them. Yenna notices them and turns. We see she holds a small skewer with several pieces of meat [LOGAN] in her left hand.

81.speaker: GROUP_Act3_WYR_OrinsImpersonation_Yenna
81.text: Please, don't hurt me. I know you don't want me but - give me a chance.
81.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player approaches while Yenna has her back to them. Yenna notices them and turns. We see she holds a small skewer with several pieces of meat [LOGAN] in her left hand.

19.speaker: GROUP_Act3_WYR_OrinsImpersonation_Yenna
19.text: Argh! You're here. I know you don't know me very well, but please - give me a chance.
19.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player approaches while Yenna has her back to them. Yenna notices them and turns. We see she holds a small skewer with several pieces of meat [LOGAN] in her left hand.

52.speaker: GROUP_Act3_WYR_OrinsImpersonation_Yenna
52.text: I - I thought you'd be hungry, so I made this for you. My mum's favourite recipe.

79.speaker: Player
79.text: When I invited you to camp, I didn't expect you to follow me into the city.

82.speaker: Player
82.text: Did you break into my room? I told you to stay away from me.

78.speaker: Player
78.text: The Elfsong needs better security. Are you up to some mischief in here?

31.speaker: Player
31.text: What have I done to earn this?

51.speaker: GROUP_Act3_WYR_OrinsImpersonation_Yenna
51.text: You let me stay, when I didn't have nowhere else to go.

0.speaker: GROUP_Act3_WYR_OrinsImpersonation_Yenna
0.text: No one ever cares about me like that. Not since my mum.

75.speaker: GROUP_Act3_WYR_OrinsImpersonation_Yenna
75.text: I wanted to do something to show I was worth keeping around. I want to be your cook.
75.context: NodeContext: nervous, trying to impress you

14.speaker: Player
14.text: You don't need to prove anything. You're welcome here.

93.speaker: GROUP_Act3_WYR_OrinsImpersonation_Yenna
93.text: You really mean it? I'll - I'll make you proud. I'll be the best cook you ever had.
93.context: CinematicNodeContext: Yenna smiles brightly.NodeContext: bubbling over, relieved, excited

27.speaker: Player
27.text: You're in luck! A position has just opened up.

9.speaker: GROUP_Act3_WYR_OrinsImpersonation_Yenna
9.text: It has? You're not just making it up?
9.context: CinematicNodeContext: Yenna looks a little suspicious. The player shakes their head - they aren't making this up.

45.speaker: GROUP_Act3_WYR_OrinsImpersonation_Yenna
45.text: Oh, thank you! Thank you! You won't regret this. I'll - I'll be the best cook you ever had.

73.speaker: GROUP_Act3_WYR_OrinsImpersonation_Yenna
73.text: Do - do you want to try it?
73.context: CinematicNodeContext: Yenna offers the skewer to the playerNodeContext: Hopeful -really wants you to like the food she offers

94.speaker: Player
94.text: Perhaps later, when I've more of an appetite.

2.speaker: GROUP_Act3_WYR_OrinsImpersonation_Yenna
2.text: Did - did I do something wrong?
2.context: CinematicNodeContext: [LOGAN] Still holding skewer in Left hand. NodeContext: Sad, scared she's in trouble

63.speaker: GROUP_Act3_WYR_OrinsImpersonation_Yenna
63.text: I - I made is especially for you. I thought you'd like it.
63.context: CinematicNodeContext: [LOGAN] Still holding skewer in Left hand. NodeContext: Sadly, disappointed

46.speaker: GROUP_Act3_WYR_OrinsImpersonation_Yenna
46.text: It took me hours to chop the little vegetables and get the meat roasted right. And now you won't even try it...
46.context: CinematicNodeContext: Yenna, still offering the skewer, looks heartbroken, on the verge of tears. Almost impossible to refuse.NodeContext: Sad, sniffly like she's about to cry

18.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player removes a pieces of meat from the skewer (unseen in their hand), brings their hand to their mouth, eating the meat. Yenna watches, anxious to see their reaction. The player smiles, relieved - it's delicious.

37.speaker: GROUP_Act3_WYR_OrinsImpersonation_Yenna
37.context: NodeContext: with a smile, a bit smug

1.speaker: GROUP_Act3_WYR_OrinsImpersonation_Yenna
1.text: You know why? Because I put in my secret ingredient.

96.speaker: GROUP_Act3_WYR_OrinsImpersonation_Yenna
96.text: Want me to tell you what it is?

87.speaker: Player
87.text: Did - did you cook your cat?

89.speaker: GROUP_Act3_WYR_OrinsImpersonation_Yenna
89.text: You've tasted it's flesh before? Isn't it delicious?
89.context: CinematicNodeContext: Yenna smiles sweetlyNodeContext: Wicked delight - like you share a naughty secret.

60.speaker: Player
60.text: Go on then - what is it?

58.speaker: Player
58.text: You're going to tell me anyway, aren't you?

53.speaker: GROUP_Act3_WYR_OrinsImpersonation_Yenna
53.text: I put a special meat inside.
53.context: NodeContext: Giggling, like this is the funniest practical joke

6.speaker: GROUP_Act3_WYR_OrinsImpersonation_Yenna
6.text: Such a sweet little kitten. Oh how it screamed.
6.context: CinematicNodeContext: Yenna smiles sweetly. She steps aside, to reveal the body of Yenna's cat, roasting over the fire.NodeContext: Childish cruelty - glee in the cat's suffering

42.speaker: Player
42.text: I'd rather not find out, to be honest.

88.speaker: GROUP_Act3_WYR_OrinsImpersonation_Yenna
88.text: You already know. You felt it purr as it slid down your throat.
88.context: NodeContext: Childish cruelty - glee in the cat's suffering

66.speaker: Player
66.text: Taste the meal again. Try to identify the secret ingredient.

12.speaker: Narrator
12.text: *The herbs and spices are ones you recognise, staples in Baldurian cuisine. But the meat itself is unusual - gamey, tough, with a distinctly feline quality.*
12.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player eats another mouthful of the meal. Chews, thinking. Their eyes widen when they realise they're eating cat.

70.speaker: Player
70.context: CinematicNodeContext: DU bites the cat again

44.speaker: Narrator
44.text: *You taste nothing out of the ordinary - the herbs and spices sold by any market trader.*
44.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player eats another mouthful of the meal. Chews, thinking, but can't work it out.

38.speaker: Player
38.text: Too right. No way I'm eating that.

55.speaker: GROUP_Act3_WYR_OrinsImpersonation_Yenna
55.text: What a waste of good flesh.

39.speaker: Player
39.text: Take the food. Throw it away.

56.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player removes a pieces of meat from the skewer (unseen in their hand), looks at it, looks at Yenna, then carelessly tosses it away.

64.speaker: Player
64.text: No way in the hells I'm eating that.

69.speaker: Player
69.text: Don't you have any other skills?

32.speaker: GROUP_Act3_WYR_OrinsImpersonation_Yenna
32.text: Well, um, I can sew a little bit. And, um, I know most of the letters for my writing.
32.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player raises an eyebrow - is that it?NodeContext: a little scared, desperately trying to remember anything she's good at

43.speaker: GROUP_Act3_WYR_OrinsImpersonation_Yenna
43.text: I think cooking is really my main talent.

80.speaker: GROUP_Act3_WYR_OrinsImpersonation_Yenna
80.text: Please, just try it. I promise it's good.
80.context: CinematicNodeContext: Yenna offers the skewer to the playerNodeContext: persuading, nervous

47.speaker: Player
47.text: One mediocre meal isn't enough to earn a place in my camp.

3.speaker: GROUP_Act3_WYR_OrinsImpersonation_Yenna
3.text: It's not mediocre! You - you haven't even tried it!

83.speaker: GROUP_Act3_WYR_OrinsImpersonation_Yenna
83.text: You don't believe me do you? Taste it, and then tell me it's 'mediocre'.
83.context: CinematicNodeContext: Yenna offers the skewer to the playerNodeContext: challenging the player to try it

62.speaker: Player
62.text: First let me try the food. Then I'll decide.

74.speaker: GROUP_Act3_WYR_OrinsImpersonation_Yenna
74.text: I- I hope you like it.
74.context: CinematicNodeContext: Yenna offers the skewer to the player

30.speaker: Player
30.text: Get the hells out of here.

13.speaker: Player
13.text: I made myself clear. You're not welcome here.

95.speaker: GROUP_Act3_WYR_OrinsImpersonation_Yenna
95.text: I know. But I don't have nowhere else to go.

92.speaker: GROUP_Act3_WYR_OrinsImpersonation_Yenna
92.text: I didn't come to beg. I can work. I can cook for you. I can help - let me prove it.

21.speaker: GROUP_Act3_WYR_OrinsImpersonation_Yenna
21.text: It's called Heap Gate Mess. A Baldur's Gate classic.

54.speaker: GROUP_Act3_WYR_OrinsImpersonation_Yenna
54.text: My mum always used to make it for me. She used to change the recipe a lot, 'cause she had to, um, borrow some of the ingredients.

49.speaker: GROUP_Act3_WYR_OrinsImpersonation_Yenna
49.text: I put in some bits from your supplies. I hope you don't mind.

5.speaker: GROUP_Act3_WYR_OrinsImpersonation_Yenna
5.text: She used to work in the kitchens at some fancy noble's house.

24.speaker: GROUP_Act3_WYR_OrinsImpersonation_Yenna
24.text: I- I know it won't be good like she used to do. But I think I remembered everything.

25.speaker: Player
25.text: You're up to something. Go on - spit it out.

84.speaker: GROUP_Act3_WYR_OrinsImpersonation_Yenna
84.text: No - I'm not up to anything! I just wanted to say thank you.

76.speaker: GROUP_Act3_WYR_OrinsImpersonation_Yenna
76.text: Well I - I just wanted you to give me a chance.
